message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with the problem of optimizing communication quality in wireless networks, which is a common topic in the Information Theory (cs.IT) and Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI) sub-categories. The use of a multi-armed bandit formulation and the exploration of arm dependencies suggest a possible connection to the Machine Learning (cs.LG) and Systems and Control (cs.SY) sub-categories. Finally, the problem of dealing with unknown and dynamic environments is a typical challenge in the Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) sub-category.
